special:
The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:
This update uses a new upstream release, which includes additional bug
fixes. After a standard system update you need to restart Quagga to make
all the necessary changes.
threat: A remote attacker could use this flaw to cause Quagga to crash, resulting in a denial of service.
A remote attacker could use this flaw to cause Quagga to crash, resulting in a denial of service.
